NameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: THE CENTER FOR HEALTH PROMOTION INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: MAINEHEALTH WILL LEAD THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE PREMIER COMMUNITY CARE NETWORK THAT PROVIDES A BROAD RANGE OF INTEGRATED HEALTH CARE SERVICES IN MAINE AND NORTHERN NEW ENGLAND. THROUGH MAINEHEALTH'S AFFILIATED ORGANIZATIONS, THE NETWORK WILL ORGANIZE SERVICES ALONG THE FULL CONTINUUM OF CARE NECESSARY TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH STATUS OF THE POPULATIONS IT SERVES IN A COST EFFECTIVE MANNER.
IRS990.MissionDescription: MAINEHEALTH WILL LEAD THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE PREMIER COMMUNITY CARE NETWORK THAT PROVIDES A BROAD RANGE OF INTEGRATED HEALTH CARE SERVICES IN MAINE AND NORTHERN NEW ENGLAND. THROUGH MAINEHEALTH'S AFFILIATED ORGANIZATIONS, THE NETWORK WILL ORGANIZE SERVICES ALONG THE FULL CONTINUUM OF CARE NECESSARY TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH STATUS OF THE POPULATIONS IT SERVES IN A COST EFFECTIVE MANNER.
IRS990.Description: THE CORPORATION IS ORGANIZED FOR THE FOLLOWING PURPOSES: TO PROMOTE AND SUPPORT THE PROVISION OF INTEGRATED HEALTH CARE SERVICES WITHIN A COST-EFFECTIVE SYSTEM ALONG A CONTINUUM FROM PREVENTION TO TERTIARY CARE FOR THOSE IN NEED REGARDLESS OF RACE, RELIGION, COLOR, AGE, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, NATIONAL ORIGIN AND SOCIAL OR ECONOMIC STATUS; TO SUPPORT THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE KNOWLEDGE AND PRACTICE OF, AND EDUCATION AND RESEARCH IN MEDICINE, SURGERY, NURSING AND OTHER SUBJECTS RELATING TO THE CARE, TREATMENT AND HEALING OF HUMANS TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH AND WELFARE OF ALL PERSONS, AND TO SPONSOR, DEVELOP AND PROMOTE SERVICES AND PROGRAMS WHICH ARE CHARITABLE, SCIENTIFIC OR EDUCATIONAL AND WHICH ADDRESS THE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL NEEDS OF THE COMMUNITY IT SERVES. (CONTINUED ON SCHEDULE O) (CONTINUED FROM PAGE 2, LINE 4A OF FORM 990) SEE COMMUNITY BENEFIT STATEMENT ATTACHED.

IRS990ScheduleA.GeneralExplanation: PART I, LINE 11, COLUMN (VII): MAINEHEALTH ALSO PROVIDES VARIOUS MANAGEMENT SERVICES TO ITS SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS INCLUDING; PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT SERVICES, INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY SERVICES, LEGAL SERVICES AND AUDIT & COMPLIANCE SERVICES.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 1A
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS SOCIAL CLUB MEMBERSHIPS. DUE TO CLUB RESTRICTIONS, ALL MEMBERSHIPS NEED TO BE INDIVIDUAL MEMBERSHIPS SO THE CEO IS NAMED ON THE ORGANIZATION'S MEMBERSHIPS. THE SOCIAL CLUBS ARE USED PRIMARILY FOR MEETING SPACE OPTIONS AND BUSINESS FUNCTIONS FOR THE ORGANIZATION.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: WILLIAM L. CARON, JR. 0 260,144 0 FRANCIS G. MCGINTY 0 147,054 0 DONALD E. QUIGLEY 0 45,208 0 DENNIS P. KING 0 144,079 0 WILLIAM S. SCHOFIELD 0 12,044 0 JEFFREY AALBERG, M.D. 0 1,109 0

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MAINEHEALTH WILL LEAD THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE PREMIER COMMUNITY CARE NETWORK THAT PROVIDES A BROAD RANGE OF INTEGRATED HEALTH CARE SERVICES IN MAINE AND NORTHERN NEW ENGLAND. THROUGH MAINEHEALTH'S AFFILIATED ORGANIZATIONS, THE NETWORK WILL ORGANIZE SERVICES ALONG THE FULL CONTINUUM OF CARE NECESSARY TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH STATUS OF THE POPULATIONS IT SERVES IN A COST EFFECTIVE MANNER.
(CONTINUED FROM PAGE 2, LINE 4A OF FORM 990) SEE COMMUNITY BENEFIT STATEMENT ATTACHED.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS MEMBERS WHO SERVE ON A BOARD OF CORPORATORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ELECTION OF MEMBERS AND THEIR RIGHTS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF CORPORATORS HAS THE ABILITY TO ELECT TRUSTEES, EXCEPT FOR "TRANSITIONAL TRUSTEES", AT AN ANNUAL OR A SPECIAL MEETING.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: DECISIONS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF MEMBERS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AS STATED IN THE ORGANIZATION'S BY LAWS, THE BOARD OF CORPORATORS SHALL ACT ON ANY MATTERS BROUGHT TO IT BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE 990 WAS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT & TREASURER ALSO REVIEWED THE 990 IN DETAIL PRIOR TO SIGNING THE RETURN. THE FORM 990 WAS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE FULL BOARD OF TRUSTEES.
CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATMENTS ARE OBTAINED ANNUALLY. THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS THE REPONSES TO THESE DOCUMENTS AND ADDRESSES ANY ISSUES IMMEDIATELY.

MAINEHEALTH USES AN OUTSIDE FIRM, TOWERS PERRIN, TO PERFORM AN INDEPENDENT BENCHMARK ANALYSIS. THEY MEET WITH THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE TO REVIEW EACH EXECUTIVE BENCHMARK REPORT. THE COMMITTEE THEN DELIBERATES ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WRITTEN SALARY AND INCENTIVE PLAN PHILOSOPHY AND DOCUMENTS BEFORE MAKING A FINAL DECISION. ALL DECISIONS AND MEETINGS ARE CAPTURED IN MINUTES. THERE ARE APPROPRIATE SIGN OFFS AT ALL LEVELS.

MAINEHEALTH USES AN OUTSIDE FIRM, TOWERS PERRIN, TO PERFORM AN INDEPENDENT BENCHMARK ANALYSIS. THEY MEET WITH THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE TO REVIEW EACH EXECUTIVE BENCHMARK REPORT. THE COMMITTEE THEN DELIBERATES ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WRITTEN SALARY AND INCENTIVE PLAN PHILOSOPHY AND DOCUMENTS BEFORE MAKING A FINAL DECISION. ALL DECISIONS AND MEETINGS ARE CAPTURED IN MINUTES. THERE ARE APPROPRIATE SIGN OFFS AT ALL LEVELS.
DOCUMENTS THAT ARE REQUIRED TO BE OPEN FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 16A: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A WRITTEN JOINT VENTURE POLICY. HOWEVER, THERE IS AN EVALUATION OF ALL JOINT VENTURE ARRANGEMENTS AS WELL AS PARTICIPATION IN GOVERNANCE ON THE JOINT VENTURE BOARDS. THIS ENSURES THAT THE ORGANIZATION IS IN COMPLIANCE WITH FEDERAL LAWS AND THE TAX EXEMPT STATUS OF THE ORGANIZATION WITH RESPECT TO ITS JOINT VENTURE ARRANGEMENTS IS PROTECTED. SCHEDULE R, PART II: THE PUBLIC CHARITY STATUS OF MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS (EIN 26-3426990)AND LINCOLN COUNTY MEDICAL GROUP (EIN 26-3878235) ARE STILL PENDING IRS APPROVAL.
